response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to me due to its unique features and the effort put into its creation. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I believe we can find a fair compromise. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $12,000. I am confident this price reflects both the value I place on it and what you perceive its worth to be. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
